oracle.iam.identity.dbs.integration.openfire

Class DatabaseFeature

  • java.lang.Object
    • oracle.iam.identity.foundation.AbstractLoggable
      • oracle.iam.identity.foundation.AbstractObject
        • oracle.iam.identity.foundation.AbstractLookup
          • oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskDescriptor
            • oracle.iam.identity.connector.integration.TargetFeature
              • oracle.iam.identity.dbs.integration.openfire.DatabaseFeature
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object>, oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable

    public class DatabaseFeature
extends oracle.iam.identity.connector.integration.TargetFeature
    The DatabaseFeature provides the base feature description of a Database.
    Implementation of a database may vary in locations of certain informations and object.
    Since:
    1.0.0.0
    Version:
    1.0.0.0

    • Method Detail

      • fetchSchema

        public final boolean fetchSchema()
        Returns the value of the extended configuration attribute that specifies the schema definition needs always to be fetched from the Service Provider.

        Convenience method to shortens the access to the configuration attribute Database.OIM.Feature.FETCH_SCHEMA.

        If Database.OIM.Feature.FETCH_SCHEMA is not mapped in the underlying Metadata Descriptor this method returns false.

        Returns:
        the value of the extended configuration attribute that specifies schema definition needs always to be fetched from the Service Provider.
        Possible object is boolean.

      • multiValueSeparator

        public final java.lang.String multiValueSeparator()
        Returns separator character for Strings that provides more than one value.

        Convenience method to shortens the access to the configuration attribute Database.OIM.Feature.MULTIVALUE_SEPARATOR.

        If Database.OIM.Feature.MULTIVALUE_SEPARATOR is not mapped in the underlying Metadata Descriptor this method returns Database.MULTIVALUE_SEPARATOR_DEFAULT.

        Returns:
        separator sign for Strings that provides more than one value.

      • databaseDriverClass

        public final java.lang.String databaseDriverClass()
        Returns depending on the Database Server that you are using the JDBC driver class.

        Enter one of the following values as the JDBC driver class name: 

          +----------------------+----------------------------------------------+
  | Database Type        | Driver Class Name                            |
  +----------------------+----------------------------------------------+
  | Oracle Database      | oracle.jdbc.OracleDriver                     |
  |                      | oracle.jdbc.driver.OracleDriver              |
  | Microsoft SQL Server | com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver |
  | MySQL                | com.mysql.jdbc.Driver                        |
  | IBM DB2 UDB          | com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver                    |
  | Sybase               | com.sybase.jdbc2.jdbc.SybDriver              |
  |                      | com.sybase.jdbc3.jdbc.SybDriver              |
  +----------------------+----------------------------------------------+
        Convenience method to shortens the access to the configuration attribute Database.OIM.Resource.DATABASE_DRIVER.

        If Database.OIM.Resource.DATABASE_DRIVER is not mapped in the underlying Metadata Descriptor this method returns Database.DATABASE_DRIVER_ORACLE4.

        Returns:
        separator sign for Strings that provides more than one value.

      • systemTimeStatement

        public final java.lang.String systemTimeStatement()
        Returns the database statement to obtain the current timestamp from the database.

        Convenience method to shortens the access to the configuration attribute Database.OIM.Feature.SYSTEM_TIMESTAMP.

        Returns:
        the database statement to obtain the current timestamp from the database.

      • enforceAutoCommit

        public final boolean enforceAutoCommit()
        Returns true the JDBC Auto Commit feature needs stay on enabled after a connection was auqired from the pool.

        Convenience method to shortens the access to the configuration attribute Database.OIM.Feature.ENFORCE_AUTO_COMMIT.

        Returns:
        true the JDBC Auto Commit feature needs stay on enabled after a connection was aquired from the pool.

      • rowNumberAttribute

        public final java.lang.String rowNumberAttribute()
        Returns the name of the pseudo attribute used in paged result sets.

        Convenience method to shortens the access to the configuration attribute Database.OIM.Feature.ROW_NUMBER_ATTRIBUTE.

        Returns:
        the name of the pseudo attribute used in paged result sets.

      • registry

        public final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> registry()
        Returns the mapping of attribute names defined on this IT Resource and the parameter names expected by connector bundle configuration.
        Specified by:
        registry in class oracle.iam.identity.connector.integration.TargetFeature
        Returns:
        the mapping of attribute names defined on this IT Resource and the parameter names expected by connector bundle configuration.

      • build

        public static DatabaseFeature build(oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable loggable)
        Factory method to create an empty Metadata Descriptor which is associated with the specified logging provider loggable.

        The instance created through this constructor has to be populated manually and does not belongs to an Identity Manager Object.

        Parameters:
        loggable - the Loggable that instantiate this Metadata Descriptor configuration wrapper.
        Allowed object is Loggable.
        Returns:
        an instance of DatabaseFeature with the value provided.
        Possible object is DatabaseFeature.

      • build

        public static DatabaseFeature build(oracle.hst.foundation.logging.Loggable loggable,
                                    java.io.File file)
                             throws oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException
        Factory method to configure Metadata Descriptor from a File.
        Parameters:
        loggable - the Loggable that instantiate this Metadata Descriptor configuration wrapper.
        Allowed object is Loggable.
        file - the configuration source for the descriptor to create by parsing the underlying XML.
        Allowed object is File.
        Returns:
        an instance of DatabaseFeature with the value provided.
        Possible object is DatabaseFeature.
        Throws:
        oracle.iam.identity.foundation.TaskException - in the event of misconfiguration (such as failure to set an essential property) or if initialization fails.
